resources.string: 快来看看我使用极简绘画设计的作品！ --- 极简绘画 (简便的绘画工具) - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cache.wind.minimal.paint

Minimal Paint

Thanks for using Minimal Paint!
A Free and Open Source Software to free your creativity!

Credits

Licenses

Have fun!
